customrecordtype.description: This record holds default values that we use across all our item costing records in order to enable one point of control/use across all items. Used for percentage use, container size, etc. Only one record of this type should exist for our items, as the defaults remain the same across all items.

customrecordcustomfield.description: Description of the record and fields should be listed here.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Description of the record and fields should be listed here.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Memo

customrecordcustomfield.description: Default container size for cbm cost calculations for ocean freight.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Default container size for cbm cost calculations for ocean freight.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Container Size - Ocean

customrecordcustomfield.description: Total CBM for default container size for ocean freight.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Total CBM for default container size for ocean freight.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Container CBM - Ocean

customrecordcustomfield.description: Default container efficiency as a percentage of expected usability of total container space available for ocean freight.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Default container efficiency as a percentage of expected usability of total container space available for ocean freight.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Container Loading Efficiency - Ocean

customrecordcustomfield.description: Calculated as the total available CBM for the default container size multiplied by the efficiency percentage for ocean freight.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Calculated as the total available CBM for the default container size multiplied by the efficiency percentage for ocean freight.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Container Loadable CBM - Ocean

customrecordcustomfield.description: Default container size for cbm cost calculations for transfer freight
customrecordcustomfield.help: Default container size for cbm cost calculations for transfer freight
customrecordcustomfield.label: Container Size - Transfer

customrecordcustomfield.description: Total CBM for default container size for transfer freight.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Total CBM for default container size for transfer freight.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Container CBM - Transfer

customrecordcustomfield.description: Default container efficiency as a percentage of expected usability of total container space available for transfer freight.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Default container efficiency as a percentage of expected usability of total container space available for transfer freight.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Container Loading Efficiency - Transfer

customrecordcustomfield.description: Calculated as the total available CBM for the default container size multiplied by the efficiency percentage for transfer freight.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Calculated as the total available CBM for the default container size multiplied by the efficiency percentage for transfer freight.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Container Loadable CBM - Transfer

customrecordcustomfield.description: Average months an item will be stored by Amazon for purposes of calculating fba storage fees.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Average months an item will be stored by Amazon for purposes of calculating fba storage fees.
customrecordcustomfield.label: FBA Avg Months Stored

customrecordcustomfield.description: Monthly Cost for a standard size item per cubic foot (actual) during the months of January - September
customrecordcustomfield.help: Monthly Cost for a standard size item per cubic foot (actual) during the months of January - September
customrecordcustomfield.label: FBA Storage Fee - Standard/Non Peak

customrecordcustomfield.description: Monthly Cost for a standard size item per cubic foot (actual) during the months of October - December
customrecordcustomfield.help: Monthly Cost for a standard size item per cubic foot (actual) during the months of October - December
customrecordcustomfield.label: FBA Storage Fee - Standard/Peak

customrecordcustomfield.description: Calculated Fee at 9 months non peak and 3 Months peak per year for standard size items.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Calculated Fee at 9 months non peak and 3 Months peak per year for standard size items.
customrecordcustomfield.label: FBA Storage Weighted Fee - Standard

customrecordcustomfield.description: Monthly Cost for an oversize item per cubic foot (actual) during the months of January - September
customrecordcustomfield.help: Monthly Cost for an oversize item per cubic foot (actual) during the months of January - September
customrecordcustomfield.label: FBA Storage Fee - Oversize/Non Peak

customrecordcustomfield.description: Monthly Cost for an oversize item per cubic foot (actual) during the months of October - December
customrecordcustomfield.help: Monthly Cost for an oversize item per cubic foot (actual) during the months of October - December
customrecordcustomfield.label: FBA Storage Fee - Oversize/Peak

customrecordcustomfield.description: Calculated Fee at 9 months non peak and 3 Months peak per year for oversize items.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Calculated Fee at 9 months non peak and 3 Months peak per year for oversize items.
customrecordcustomfield.label: FBA Storage Weighted Fee - Oversize

customrecordcustomfield.description: Amazon Fuel Surcharge which applies to all Amazon FBA orders
customrecordcustomfield.help: Amazon Fuel Surcharge which applies to all Amazon FBA orders
customrecordcustomfield.label: Amazon Fuel Surcharge

customrecordcustomfield.description: Amazon's dimensional weight modifier (L * W * H)/modifier
customrecordcustomfield.help: Amazon's dimensional weight modifier (L * W * H)/modifier
customrecordcustomfield.label: FBA Dimensional Weight Modifier

customrecordcustomfield.description: The weight that, if actual weight is over, means that the higher of actual weight or dimensional weight for FBA orders applies.
customrecordcustomfield.help: The weight that, if actual weight is over, means that the higher of actual weight or dimensional weight for FBA orders applies.
customrecordcustomfield.label: FBA Min Dimensional Weight

customrecordcustomfield.description: The weight that, if actual weight is under, means that the higher of actual weight or dimensional weight for FBA orders applies.
customrecordcustomfield.help: The weight that, if actual weight is under, means that the higher of actual weight or dimensional weight for FBA orders applies.
customrecordcustomfield.label: FBA Max Dimensional Weight

customrecordcustomfield.description: The default amount for FBM Fulfillment Labor costs per item CBM
customrecordcustomfield.help: The default amount for FBM Fulfillment Labor costs per item CBM
customrecordcustomfield.label: FBM Fulfillment Labor Amt/CBM

customrecordcustomfield.description: If checked, the system will calculate fulfillment rates based on Amazon's peak rate, not their base rate. The rates are stored on the FBA Fulfillment Rates Record.
customrecordcustomfield.help: If checked, the system will calculate fulfillment rates based on Amazon's peak rate, not their base rate. The rates are stored on the FBA Fulfillment Rates Record.
customrecordcustomfield.label: FBA Peak Surcharge Active

customrecordcustomfield.description: Default percentage of orders that receive additional fees for residential delivery.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Default percentage of orders that receive additional fees for residential delivery.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Residential Delivery Percent

customrecordcustomfield.description: Default percentage of fuel surcharge applied to shipping fee total.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Default percentage of fuel surcharge applied to shipping fee total.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Fuel Surcharge Default

customrecordcustomfield.description: Default surcharge for NON-holiday season delivery.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Default surcharge for NON-holiday season delivery.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Peak/Demand Surcharge - Standard

customrecordcustomfield.description:
Default surcharge for HOLIDAY season delivery.
Set to zero for non-holiday season. Then set to the DELTA between the standard peak fee and the expected total peak fee. These will be added together (which should equal the current total peak fee desired)
customrecordcustomfield.help:
Default surcharge for HOLIDAY season delivery.
Set to zero for non-holiday season. Then set to the DELTA between the standard peak fee and the expected total peak fee. These will be added together (which should equal the current total peak fee desired)
customrecordcustomfield.label: Peak/Demand Surcharge - Holiday

customrecordcustomfield.description: Default percentage of our shipments that go to extended delivery zip codes. Affects the Delivery Area Surcharge value as applied to item costs
customrecordcustomfield.help: Default percentage of our shipments that go to extended delivery zip codes. Affects the Delivery Area Surcharge value as applied to item costs
customrecordcustomfield.label: Extended Delivery %

customrecordcustomfield.description: Additional surcharge for specific residential zip code deliveries. Enter a decimal value to use as a default fee for this field to be applied.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Additional surcharge for specific residential zip code deliveries. Enter a decimal value to use as a default fee for this field to be applied.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Extended Delivery Area Surcharge - Residential

customrecordcustomfield.description: Additional surcharge for specific commercial zip code deliveries. Enter a decimal value to use as a default fee for this field to be applied.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Additional surcharge for specific commercial zip code deliveries. Enter a decimal value to use as a default fee for this field to be applied.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Extended Delivery Area Surcharge - Commercial

customrecordcustomfield.description: Default percentage of our shipments that go to remote delivery zip codes. Affects the Remote Delivery Surcharge value as applied to item costs
customrecordcustomfield.help: Default percentage of our shipments that go to remote delivery zip codes. Affects the Remote Delivery Surcharge value as applied to item costs
customrecordcustomfield.label: Remote Delivery %

customrecordcustomfield.description: Additional surcharge for specific zip code deliveries. Enter a decimal value to use as a default fee for this field to be applied.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Additional surcharge for specific zip code deliveries. Enter a decimal value to use as a default fee for this field to be applied.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Remote Delivery Area Surcharge

customrecordcustomfield.description: Enter a default decimal value for 'other' surcharges that will apply. Includes fees such as address correction, dangerous goods, extended area, 'manual requirements', special handling, and undeliverable fees.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Enter a default decimal value for 'other' surcharges that will apply. Includes fees such as address correction, dangerous goods, extended area, 'manual requirements', special handling, and undeliverable fees.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Other Surcharge

customrecordcustomfield.description: Enter, in inches, the length + girth threshold value to trigger the additional charge per shipment for residential deliveries
customrecordcustomfield.help: Enter, in inches, the length + girth threshold value to trigger the additional charge per shipment for residential deliveries
customrecordcustomfield.label: Large - Length/Girth Residential

customrecordcustomfield.description: Enter, in inches, the length threshold value to trigger the large item additional charge per shipment for residential deliveries
customrecordcustomfield.help: Enter, in inches, the length threshold value to trigger the large item additional charge per shipment for residential deliveries
customrecordcustomfield.label: Large - Length Residential

customrecordcustomfield.description: Enter, in inches, the length + girth threshold value to trigger the large item additional charge per shipment for commercial deliveries
customrecordcustomfield.help: Enter, in inches, the length + girth threshold value to trigger the large item additional charge per shipment for commercial deliveries
customrecordcustomfield.label: Large - Length/Girth Commercial

customrecordcustomfield.description: Enter, in inches, the length threshold value to trigger the large item additional charge per shipment for commercial deliveries
customrecordcustomfield.help: Enter, in inches, the length threshold value to trigger the large item additional charge per shipment for commercial deliveries
customrecordcustomfield.label: Large - Length Commercial

customrecordcustomfield.description: If an item is over this weight, it triggers the additional handling fee. Enter in pounds. First priority on triggering AH Fees
customrecordcustomfield.help: If an item is over this weight, it triggers the additional handling fee. Enter in pounds. First priority on triggering AH Fees
customrecordcustomfield.label: Additional Handling - Weight (lbs)

customrecordcustomfield.description: If an item's length + girth is over this value, it triggers the additional handling fee. Enter in Inches. Second priority on triggering AH Fees
customrecordcustomfield.help: If an item's length + girth is over this value, it triggers the additional handling fee. Enter in Inches. Second priority on triggering AH Fees
customrecordcustomfield.label: Additional Handling - Length/Girth

customrecordcustomfield.description: If an item's length (longest edge) is over this value, it triggers the additional handling fee. Enter in Inches. Third priority on triggering AH Fees
customrecordcustomfield.help: If an item's length (longest edge) is over this value, it triggers the additional handling fee. Enter in Inches. Third priority on triggering AH Fees
customrecordcustomfield.label: Additional Handling - Length

customrecordcustomfield.description: If an item's width (2nd longest edge) is over this value, it triggers the additional handling fee. Enter in Inches. Fourth priority on triggering AH Fees
customrecordcustomfield.help: If an item's width (2nd longest edge) is over this value, it triggers the additional handling fee. Enter in Inches. Fourth priority on triggering AH Fees
customrecordcustomfield.label: Additional Handling - Width

customrecordcustomfield.description: If more than 1 item is shipped on a label and bound (strapped), then this fee applies. Threshold is set to 2 and should be compared to Max Qty per Label being 2 or more. Fifth Priority on triggering AH fees
customrecordcustomfield.help: If more than 1 item is shipped on a label and bound (strapped), then this fee applies. Threshold is set to 2 and should be compared to Max Qty per Label being 2 or more. Fifth Priority on triggering AH fees
customrecordcustomfield.label: Additional Handling - Packaging

customrecordcustomfield.description: If an item is over this weight, it triggers the Over Maximum Limits fee. Enter in LBS First priority on triggering Over Max Fees
customrecordcustomfield.help: If an item is over this weight, it triggers the Over Maximum Limits fee. Enter in LBS First priority on triggering Over Max Fees
customrecordcustomfield.label: Over Maximum - Weight (lbs)

customrecordcustomfield.description: If an item's length + girth is over this value, it triggers the Over Maximum Limits fee. Enter in LBS Second priority on triggering Over Max Fees
customrecordcustomfield.help: If an item's length + girth is over this value, it triggers the Over Maximum Limits fee. Enter in LBS Second priority on triggering Over Max Fees
customrecordcustomfield.label: Over Maximum - Length/Girth

customrecordcustomfield.description: If an item's length is over this value, it triggers the Over Maximum Limits fee. Enter in LBS Third priority on triggering Over Max Fees
customrecordcustomfield.help: If an item's length is over this value, it triggers the Over Maximum Limits fee. Enter in LBS Third priority on triggering Over Max Fees
customrecordcustomfield.label: Over Maximum - Length

customrecordcustomfield.description: The flat fee applied if a package is over a triggered, weight, length, or length + girth.
customrecordcustomfield.help: The flat fee applied if a package is over a triggered, weight, length, or length + girth.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Over Maximum Limit Fee

customrecordcustomfield.description:
UPS has a rule that if a package is designated as a "large package" then the minimum shipping weight must be at least 90 lbs.
Enter the minimum weight here in pounds from the UPS guidelines.
customrecordcustomfield.help:
UPS has a rule that if a package is designated as a "large package" then the minimum shipping weight must be at least 90 lbs.
Enter the minimum weight here in pounds from the UPS guidelines.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Large Package Minimum Weight

customrecordcustomfield.description: UPS's dimensional weight modifier (L * W * H)/modifier
customrecordcustomfield.help: UPS's dimensional weight modifier (L * W * H)/modifier
customrecordcustomfield.label: UPS Dimensional Weight Modifier

customrecordcustomfield.description: The discount rate off fees (not including base fee) that UPS provides us. Used in calculating Additional Handling, Large Package, and Over Max Limit
customrecordcustomfield.help: The discount rate off fees (not including base fee) that UPS provides us. Used in calculating Additional Handling, Large Package, and Over Max Limit
customrecordcustomfield.label: UPS Fee Discount

customrecordcustomfield.description: Enter the expected percentage of orders that will be refunded across all sales.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Enter the expected percentage of orders that will be refunded across all sales.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Default Refund Rate

customrecordcustomfield.description: Enter the percentage OF REFUNDED ORDERS that are expected to be shipped back to us.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Enter the percentage OF REFUNDED ORDERS that are expected to be shipped back to us.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Default Return Shipping Rate

customrecordcustomfield.description: Enter the percentage of RETURNED items that are expected to be resalable as like new or new.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Enter the percentage of RETURNED items that are expected to be resellable as like new or new.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Restock Rate

customrecordcustomfield.description: Enter Amazon's administration percentage OF THEIR COMMISSION (not item price) for processing a refund. This is provided by Amazon and has a maximum dollar cap.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Enter Amazon's administration percentage OF THEIR COMMISSION (not item price) for processing a refund. This is provided by Amazon and has a maximum dollar cap.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Amazon Refund Admin Fee

customrecordcustomfield.description: Enter the cap on refund administration fees that is provided by Amazon.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Enter the cap on refund administration fees that is provided by Amazon.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Amazon Refund Fee Maximum

customrecordcustomfield.description: Percentage of gross sales expected to be returned to retailer
customrecordcustomfield.help: Percentage of gross sales expected to be returned to retailer
customrecordcustomfield.label: Bulk Refund Rate

customrecordcustomfield.description: Markup for any refund costs (e.g. freight, coupons, etc) passed on to us by the retailer
customrecordcustomfield.help: Markup for any refund costs (e.g. freight, coupons, etc) passed on to us by the retailer
customrecordcustomfield.label: Bulk Refund Cost Markup %

customrecordcustomfield.description: Enter the determined fixed overhead percentage that should be applied to an item's first cost value.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Enter the determined fixed overhead percentage that should be applied to an item's first cost value.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Fixed Overhead Pct

customrecordcustomfield.description: The fixed overhead percentage for general administrative costs.
customrecordcustomfield.help: The fixed overhead percentage for general administrative costs.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Administration Percent

customrecordcustomfield.description: The fixed overhead percentage for warehouse costs.
customrecordcustomfield.help: The fixed overhead percentage for warehouse costs.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Warehouse Percent
